mapper.insert: INSERT INTO messages (message_id, message_sender_id, message_receiver_id, message_content, message_sent_date) VALUES (#{messageId}, #{messageSenderId}, #{messageReceiverId}, #{messageContent}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'))
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM messages WHERE message_receiver_id = #{messageReceiverId} AND message_read_date IS NULL AND receiver_enable = 1

SELECT message_id, message_sender_id, senderName, messageReceiverId, receiverName, message_sent_date, message_read_date FROM ( SELECT rn.message_id, rn.message_sender_id, rn.senderName, rn.messageReceiverId, rn.receiverName, rn.message_sent_date, rn.message_read_date, ROWNUM AS row_num FROM ( SELECT msg.message_id, msg.message_sender_id, ms.member_name AS senderName, LISTAGG(msg.message_receiver_id, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY msg.message_receiver_id) AS messageReceiverId, LISTAGG(mr.member_name, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY mr.member_name) AS receiverName, msg.message_sent_date, msg.message_read_date FROM messages msg LEFT JOIN members ms ON msg.message_sender_id = ms.member_id LEFT JOIN members mr ON msg.message_receiver_id = mr.member_id WHERE msg.message_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT message_id FROM messages WHERE message_receiver_id = #{messageReceiverId} AND receiver_enable = 1 ) GROUP BY msg.message_id, msg.message_sender_id, ms.member_name, msg.message_sent_date, msg.message_read_date ORDER BY msg.message_sent_date DESC ) rn WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNo} ) WHERE row_num >= #{startRowNo}
SELECT message_id, message_content FROM messages WHERE message_receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND receiver_enable = 1 ORDER BY message_sent_date desc
SELECT count(message_id) from messages where message_receiver_id in #{receiverId} AND receiver_enable = 1

SELECT message_id, message_sender_id, senderName, messageReceiverId, receiverName, message_sent_date, message_read_date FROM ( SELECT rn.message_id, rn.message_sender_id, rn.senderName, rn.messageReceiverId, rn.receiverName, rn.message_sent_date, rn.message_read_date, ROWNUM AS row_num FROM ( SELECT msg.message_id, msg.message_sender_id, ms.member_name AS senderName, LISTAGG(msg.message_receiver_id, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY msg.message_receiver_id) AS messageReceiverId, LISTAGG(mr.member_name, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY mr.member_name) AS receiverName, msg.message_sent_date, msg.message_read_date FROM messages msg LEFT JOIN members ms ON msg.message_sender_id = ms.member_id LEFT JOIN members mr ON msg.message_receiver_id = mr.member_id WHERE msg.message_sender_id = #{messageSenderId} AND sender_enable = 1 GROUP BY msg.message_id, msg.message_sender_id, ms.member_name, msg.message_sent_date, msg.message_read_date ORDER BY msg.message_sent_date DESC ) rn WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNo} ) WHERE row_num >= #{startRowNo}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT message_id) FROM messages WHERE message_sender_id = #{senderId} AND sender_enable = 1
SELECT message_id, message_content FROM messages WHERE message_sender_id = #{senderId} AND sender_enable = 1 ORDER BY message_sent_date desc

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT m.message_id) FROM messages m
LEFT JOIN members sender ON m.message_sender_id = sender.member_id
LEFT JOIN members receiver ON m.message_receiver_id = receiver.member_id
WHERE
m.message_sender_id = #{messageSenderId}
m.message_receiver_id = #{messageReceiverId}
AND m.message_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND sender.member_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND receiver.member_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT message_id, message_sender_id, senderName, messageReceiverId, receiverName, message_sent_date, message_read_date FROM ( SELECT rn.message_id, rn.message_sender_id, rn.senderName, rn.messageReceiverId, rn.receiverName, rn.message_sent_date, rn.message_read_date, ROWNUM AS row_num FROM ( SELECT msg.message_id, msg.message_sender_id, ms.member_name AS senderName, LISTAGG(msg.message_receiver_id, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY msg.message_receiver_id) AS messageReceiverId, LISTAGG(mr.member_name, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY mr.member_name) AS receiverName, msg.message_sent_date, msg.message_read_date FROM messages msg LEFT JOIN members ms ON msg.message_sender_id = ms.member_id LEFT JOIN members mr ON msg.message_receiver_id = mr.member_id WHERE
msg.message_receiver_id = #{messageReceiverId} AND ms.member_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND receiver_enable = 1
msg.message_sender_id = #{messageSenderId} AND mr.member_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND sender_enable = 1
msg.message_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
GROUP BY msg.message_id, msg.message_sender_id, ms.member_name, msg.message_sent_date, msg.message_read_date ORDER BY msg.message_sent_date DESC ) rn WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNo} ) WHERE row_num >= #{startRowNo}

SELECT msg.message_id, msg.message_sender_id, ms.member_name AS senderName, LISTAGG(msg.message_receiver_id, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY msg.message_receiver_id) AS receiverId, LISTAGG(m.member_name, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY m.member_name) AS receiverName, msg.message_sent_date FROM messages msg LEFT JOIN members m ON msg.message_receiver_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN members ms ON msg.message_sender_id = ms.member_id WHERE msg.message_id = #{messageId} GROUP BY msg.message_id, msg.message_sender_id, ms.member_name, msg.message_sent_date
SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(message_content) AS messageContent FROM messages WHERE message_id = #{messageId}
SELECT msg.message_receiver_id AS receiverId, m.member_name AS receiverName FROM messages msg LEFT JOIN members m ON msg.message_receiver_id = m.member_id WHERE msg.message_id = #{messageId}
mapper.update: UPDATE messages SET message_read_date = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') WHERE message_receiver_id = #{messageId}
mapper.select: SELECT m.member_name AS senderName, msg.message_id, msg.message_content, msg.MESSAGE_RECEIVER_ID, msg.message_sent_date FROM messages msg LEFT JOIN members m ON m.member_id = msg.message_sender_id WHERE msg.MESSAGE_RECEIVER_ID = #{receiverId} AND msg.receiver_enable = 1 ORDER BY msg.message_sent_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE messages SET receiver_enable = 0 WHERE message_receiver_id = #{messageReceiverId} AND message_id = #{messageId}
UPDATE messages SET sender_enable = 0 WHERE message_sender_id = #{messageSenderId} AND message_id = #{messageId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM messages WHERE sender_enable = 0 AND receiver_enable = 0
